articles.title: 15 Billion Miles Away, NASA's Voyager 1 Comes Back To Life Using 1981 Tech - NDTV
articles.description: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981.
articles.content: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981. NASA engineers at Jet Propul… [+2263 chars]

articles.title: Earth’s Invisible Shield Rebounds: The Remarkable 2024 Ozone Recovery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: In 2024, the ozone hole over the Antarctic showed a notable reduction in size, ranking as the seventh smallest since monitoring began post-Montreal Protocol. This improvement is credited to ongoing reductions in CFC emissions and enhanced atmospheric dynamics…
articles.content:
